resources.string:
The Developer of this application is in no any way associated with Media Molecule nor receiving compensation in any form. indreams.me (unofficial) was made for the sole purpose of making it easier for the user to access the official indreams.me (https://indreams.me/) web page. 

 The full source code used to wrap indreams.me can be found at ???LINK ADDRESS TO GITHUB???. 

By using this application you acknowledge the above statement in full.
